text: Barbara Shelley (born Barbara T. Kowin; 13 February 1932 – 4 January 2021) was an English actress. Shelley was born in London. Her career lasted from 1953 to 1992. She was best known for her roles in Dracula: Prince of Darkness, Village of the Damned, and Murder at Site 3. Shelley died of problems caused by COVID-19 on 4 January 2021 in London at the age of 88.Barbara Shelley 1932 – 2021Barbara Shelley, Hammer Horror, Doctor Who Star, Dies of COVID at 88 ==References== ==Other websites== * *Barbara Shelley at HorrorStars Category:1932 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in London Category:Actors from London Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English stage actors
title: Barbara Shelley
